name: Window Warfare
description:
A tower defense where everything is its own window. How to play:

Drag your turret windows in range of bug windows to knock them out. Once knocked out you can properly dispose of them by exiting them off. Survive all 10 waves to achieve victory!

Controls:
  • Mouse  -  Interacts with windows
  • Esc:  -  Closes the game

Window Warfare was made for Major Jam 5 with the limitation:
"The Gameplay Must Reach Beyond The Game Space"
